meanings.sent1: She preferred an unfussy hairstyle for easy mornings.
meanings.sent2: The recipe was unfussy, requiring only a few basic ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The cat chose the unfussy cardboard box over the fancy bed.
meanings.sent4: His unfussy approach to problem-solving saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The unfussy design of the room made it feel spacious and calm.

meanings.definition: Not requiring much attention or effort
meanings.sent1: His unfussy wardrobe consisted of simple t-shirts and jeans.
meanings.sent2: The unfussy task of watering the plants was quickly done.
meanings.sent3: She took an unfussy approach to packing for the trip, throwing items in a bag.
meanings.sent4: The unfussy solution to the puzzle surprised everyone with its simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The unfussy instructions made assembling the furniture a breeze.

meanings.sent1: He was unfussy about where to eat, as long as it was quick.
meanings.sent2: The unfussy eater happily tried any new dish without complaint.
meanings.sent3: The unfussy cat ate both wet and dry food without hesitation.
meanings.sent4: Her unfussy attitude towards fashion meant she wore whatever was clean.
meanings.sent5: The unfussy customer was content with the basic features of the product.
